name:
This list requires your input for its continuous improvement.
Read the contribution guide for instructions on how
you can contribute.
Alternatively, you can send me an email
if you find the process too cumbersome or confusing.
For more awesome lists, see awesome.
SIR
description: Software-artifact infrastructure repository; Java, C, C++, and C# software together with test suites and fault data.

name: PROMISE
description: About 20 datasets related to software engineering research.

name: FLOSSmole
description: Collaborative collection and analysis of free/libre/open source project data.

name: Zenodo
description: Software data collections in CERN's open-access repository.

name: Software Engineering Artifacts Can Really Assist Future Tasks
AndroidTimeMachine
description: Graph-based dataset of commit history of 8,431 real-world Android apps.

name: AndroZoo
description: Collection of Android Applications.

name: Bug Prediction Dataset
description: Collection of models and metrics from Eclipse JDT Core, PDE UI, Equinox Framework, Lucene, Mylyn, and their histories.

name: Code Reviews
description: Code reviews of OpenStack, LibreOffice, AOSP, Qt, Eclipse.

name: CoREBench
description: Collection of 70 realistically Complex Regression Errors that were systematically extracted from the repositories and bug reports of four open-source software projects: Make, Grep, Findutils, and Coreutils.

name: Cryptocurrency GitHub Activity and Market Cap Dataset
description: Activity such as commits, stars, prices, and market cap of over 200 cryptocurrency projects on GitHub over time. Raw, historic data is also available.

name: Defects4J
description: Collection of 395 reproducible bugs collected with the goal of advancing software testing research.

name: Eclipse AERI stacktraces
description: Collection of stacktraces of Exceptions encountered by users of the Eclipse IDE, as retrieved by the AERI reporting system.

name: Enron Spreadsheets and Emails
description: All the spreadsheets and emails used in the paper 'Enron's Spreadsheets and Related Emails: A Dataset and Analysis'.

name: Findbugs-maven
description: Set of FindBugs reports for the Java projects of the Maven repository.

name: GHTorrent
description: Scalable, queriable, offline mirror of data offered through the GitHub REST API.

name: GitHub Bug Dataset
description: Bug Dataset of 15 Java open-source projects characterized by static source code metrics.

name: GitHub on Google BigQuery
description: GitHub data accessible through Google's BigQuery platform.

name: Grammar Zoo
description: Collection of grammars of DSLs and GPLs, some extracted from metamodels and document schemata.

name: KaVE
description: Developer tool interaction data.

name: Linux Kernel 4.21 Call Graphs
description: The Linux Kernel 4.21 Call Graphs produced using CScout.

name: Maven metrics
description: Collection of software complexity & sizing metrics for the Maven Repository.

name: Maven Dependency Graph
description: Snapshot of the whole Maven Central taken on September 6, 2018, stored in a graph database.

name: mzdata
description: Multi-extract and multi-level dataset of Mozilla issue tracking history.

name: npm-miner
description: The dataset contains the analysis results of 5 open source software quality tools eslint, escomplex, nsp, jsinspect and sonarjs for 2000 popular (in terms of stars and downloads) npm packages.

name: OCL Expressions on GitHub
description: Data set of 9188 OCL expressions originating from 504 EMF meta-models in 245 systematically selected GitHub repositories.

name: RepoReapers Data Set
description: Data set containing a collection of engineered software projects from GHTorrent.

name: Software Heritage Graph Dataset
description: Graph of the development history and file metadata of >80 million software projects from various forges (GitHub, Gitlab, Debian, PyPI, Google Code, etc) in a deduplicated and unified representation (paper here).

name: STAMINA
description: (STAte Machine INference Approaches) data are used to benchmark techniques for learning deterministic finite state machines (FSMs).

name: Stack Exchange
description: Anonymized dump of all user-contributed content on the Stack Exchange network.

name: TravisTorrent
description: Provides free and easy-to-use Traivs CI build analyses.

name: Ultimate Debian Database (UDD)
description: Data about various aspects of Debian (e.g. packages, bugs, mainteners) in the same SQL database.

name: Unified Bug Dataset
description: Static source code based datasets which includes the Bugcatchers Bug Dataset, the Bug Prediction Dataset, the Eclipse Bug Dataset, the GitHub Bug Dataset, some datasets from the PROMISE repository.

name: Unix history
description: Git repository with 46 years of Unix history evolution.

name: astminer
description: Library and tool for mining of path-based representations of code and other data derived from ASTs.

name: Boa
description: Domain-specific language and infrastructure that eases mining software repositories.

name: buckwheat
description: Multi-language tokenizer for extracting identifiers from source code.

name: ckjm
description: Chidamber and Kemerer Java Metrics.

name: Coming
description: A Java framework for analyzing code changes and mining instances of change patterns from Git repositories.

name: CryptOSS
description: Mine GitHub activity and market cap data for cryptocurrency projects.

name: DbDeo
description: Extract embedded SQL statements and detect database schema smells.

name: Designite
description: Compute source code metrics and detect a variety of implementation, design, and architecture smells for C#.

name: DesigniteJava
description: Compute source code metrics and detect a variety of implementation and design smells for Java.

name: Diggit
description: Agile Ruby Tool to analyze Git repositories.

name: GrimoireLab
description: Free/Libre/Open Source tools for Software Development Analytics.

name: MetricMiner
description: Lean Java DSL to mine and extract data (e.g. commits, developers, modifications, diffs) from Git and SVN repositories.

name: Maven-miner
description: Java tools and infrastructure to resolve the whole Maven dependency graph, hosted in Maven Central, in the form of a Neo4j Graph.

name: Perceval
description: Fetch repository data from tens of back-ends.

name: Puppeteer
description: Detect configuration smells in Puppet code.

name: PyDriller
description: Python Framework to analyse Git repositories.

name: qmcalc
description: Calculate quality metrics from C source code.

name: reaper
description: Python tool to compute a score for a repository from GHTorrent. The score quantifies the extent to which the project contained within the repository is engineered.

name: RefactoringMiner
description: Library/API for detection of refactorings in changes of Java code.

name: VulData7
description: Java framework enabling the automated collection of commits fixing vulnerabilities that are reported in NVD (links NVD with Git).

name: PROMISE: Predictive Models and Data Analytics in Software Engineering conference
ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology (TOSEM)
ESEC/FSE: ACM Joint European Software Engineering Conference and Symposium on the Foundations of Software Engineering
ICSE: International Conference on Software Engineering
SANER: IEEE International Conference on Software Analysis, Evolution and Reengineering
